name: Scream
description: Scream is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Scream to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

en.name: Scream
en.description: Scream is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Scream to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

fr.name: Scream
fr.description: Scream est un protocole de prêt décentralisé permettant aux particuliers d'accéder à des services financiers. Il s'agit d'un protocole open source sans autorisation sur Fantom. Les utilisateurs peuvent déposer leurs actifs sur Scream pour générer un rendement, similaire à un compte d'épargne traditionnel.

es.name: Scream
es.description: Scream es un protocolo descentralizado de préstamos para que las personas accedan a diferentes servicios financieros. Es un protocolo de código abierto que no requiere de ninguna autorización para participar que opera en Fantom. Los usuarios pueden depositar sus activos en Scream para obtener rendimiento, similar a una cuenta de ahorro tradicional.

de.name: Scream
de.description: Scream ist ein dezentrales Kreditprotokoll, das Privatpersonen den Zugang zu Finanzdienstleistungen ermöglicht. Es ist ein erlaubnisfreies, quelloffenes Protokoll, das Nutzern auf Fantom dient. Nutzer können ihr Vermögen auf Scream hinterlegen, um eine Rendite zu erzielen, ähnlich wie bei einem traditionellen Sparkonto.

pt.name: Scream
pt.description: Scream é um protocolo de empréstimo descentralizado, para que indivíduos acessem serviços financeiro. É um protocolo permissionless e código aberto que atende usuários na rede Fantom. Usuários podem depositar seus ativos em Scream para receber rendimentos, de forma similar a uma conta poupança tradicional.

el.name: Scream
el.description: Scream is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Scream to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

tr.name: Scream
tr.description: Scream, bireylerin finansal hizmetlere erişmesi için merkezi olmayan bir borç verme protokolüdür. Fantom'da kullanıcılara hizmet veren izinsiz, açık kaynaklı bir protokoldür. Kullanıcılar, geleneksel bir tasarruf hesabına benzer şekilde, getiri elde etmek için varlıklarını Scream'e yatırabilirler.

vi.name: Scream
vi.description: Scream is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Scream to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.

zh.name: Scream
zh.description: Scream 是个去中心化的借贷协议，为个人提供金融服务。它是一种无需许可而且开源的协议，为在 Fantom 上的用户提供服务。用户可以将资产存入 Scream 以赚取收益，就像传统的储蓄账户一样。

hi.name: Scream
hi.description: Scream वित्तीय सेवाओं तक पहुँचने के लिए व्यक्तियों के लिए एक विकेन्द्रीकृत उधार प्रोटोकॉल है। यह Fantom पर उपयोगकर्ताओं की सेवा करने वाला एक अनुमति रहित, खुला स्रोत प्रोटोकॉल है। उपयोगकर्ता एक पारंपरिक बचत खाते के समान, उपज अर्जित करने के लिए Scream पर अपनी संपत्ति जमा कर सकते हैं।

ja.name: Scream
ja.description: Screamは個人が金融サービスにアクセスするための分散型融資プロトコルです。パーミッションレスでオープンソースのプロトコルであり、Fantom上のユーザーにサービスを提供します。ユーザーはScreamに資産を預けることで、従来の普通預金と同様に利回りを得ることができます。

id.name: Scream
id.description: Scream is a decentralized lending protocol for individuals to access financial services. It is a permissionless, open source protocol serving users on Fantom. Users can deposit their assets on Scream to earn yield, similar to a traditional savings account.
